member.name: M:Olive.Services.GeoLocation.GeoLocationExtensions.GetDistance(Olive.Services.GeoLocation.IGeoLocation,Olive.Services.GeoLocation.IGeoLocation)
member.summary: Gets the geo distance in miles between this and another specified location.

member.summary: Gets the geo distance in miles between this located object and a specified location.

member.name: M:Olive.Services.GeoLocation.GeoLocationExtensions.GetDistance(Olive.Services.GeoLocation.IGeoLocation,Olive.Services.GeoLocation.IGeoLocated)
member.summary: Gets the geo distance in miles between this location and a specified located object.

member.name: M:Olive.Services.GeoLocation.GeoLocationExtensions.GetDistance(Olive.Services.GeoLocation.IGeoLocated,Olive.Services.GeoLocation.IGeoLocated)
member.summary: Gets the geo distance in miles between this and another specified located object.

member.name: M:Olive.Services.GeoLocation.GeoLocationService.GetPostcodeLocation(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Gets the Geo Location of a specified postcode using Google API. This method has daily usage limit of 25000 calls.

member.name: M:Olive.Services.GeoLocation.GeoLocationService.CalculateDistance(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Gets the distance between 2 locations in miles.

member.name: M:Olive.Services.GeoLocation.GeoLocationService.CalculateTravelDistance(System.String,System.String,System.String)
